name: Matcha Ice Cream
description: A creamy, sweet ice cream flavored with matcha green tea powder, offering a unique and refreshing taste.
steps: Whisk together milk, cream, sugar, and matcha powder until the sugar dissolves.
Chill the mixture in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours.
Process in an ice cream maker according to the manufacturer's instructions.
Freeze the churned ice cream until firm, about 2-3 hours.
tips: Ensure the matcha powder is fully dissolved in the mixture for an even flavor.
If no ice cream maker is available, freeze and whisk the mixture every hour to avoid ice crystals.
Serve with mochi or a sprinkle of additional matcha powder on top for decoration.
